summary: Relating to the Municipal Garbage Utility; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property in Blocks 7, 17 & 18, 1st Addition to River Park for a refuse receiving and transfer site, as an acquisition for, and addition and betterment to and extension of the municipal refuse collection and disposal system and plant; providing for payment therefor and for expenses of the Law and Engineering Depts. in connection with said acquisition.
